headline: Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement for the fourth quarter of the fiscal year 2081/82
Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement for the third quarter of the fiscal year 2081/82
Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement from the second quarter of the fiscal year 2081/82
Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement from the first quarter of the fiscal year 2081/82
13th AGM minutes - Mandu Hydropower Limited (MANDU)
Mandu Hydropower Limited has proclaimed its 13th AGM going to be held on Ashwin 14, 2081 and has published its annual financial statement for the fiscal year 2080/81
Declaration of 12% Cash Dividend - Mandu Hydropower Limited (MANDU)
Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement from the fourth quarter of the fiscal year 2080/81
Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement from the third quarter of the fiscal year 2080/81
Mandu Hydropower Limited has issued a notice to the all investors/stakeholders regarding the expiration of the lock-in period for its 22,935.00 units of shares on 23rd of Falgun, 2080
Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement from the second quarter of the fiscal year 2080/81

Mandu Hydropower Limited has published its provisional financial statement from the first quarter of the fiscal year 2080/81
Mandu Hydropower Limited has proclaimed its 12th AGM going to be held on Mangsir 15, 2080 and has published its annual financial statement of the fiscal year 2078/79 and 2079/80
1,36,36,370.00 units of IPO Shares has been Listed in NEPSE. The open price range is set as Rs.124.42 to Rs.373.26 for the first transactions - Mandu Hydropower Limited (MANDU)
Mandu Hydropower Limited has urged its promoter shareholders to dematerialize their shares within the given time frame.
Mandu Hydropower Limited has appointed NIMB Ace Capital Limited as its share registrar started from Ashwin 04, 2080
Mandu Hydropower Limited has distributed its 12,05,320.00 units of premium IPO shares to the general public on Bhadra 24, 2080
Mandu Hydropower Limited is going to close its 12,05,320.00 units of premium IPO shares to the general public from today, Bhadra 13, 2080
Mandu Hydropower Limited is going to open its 12,05,320.00 units of premium IPO shares to the general public starting from today, Bhadra 10, 2080
Mandu Hydropower Limited is going to issue its 12,05,320.00 units of premium IPO shares to the general public starting from 10th - 13th Bhadra, 2080

Mandu Hydropower Limited has distributed its 2,72,730.00 units of premium IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Lalitpur District, Bagmati VDC Ward No. 01 & 02, Makwanpur District Bhimphedi VDC Ward No. 05, 06, 07, & 08/Indra Sarowar 03 on Shrawan 31, 2080

Mandu Hydropower Limited is going to close its 2,72,730.00 units of premium IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Lalitpur District, Bagmati VDC Ward No. 01 & 02, Makwanpur District Bhimphedi VDC Ward No. 05, 06, 07, & 08/Indra Sarowar 03 from today, Shrawan 26, 2080
Mandu Hydropower Limited has distributed its 1,36,364.00 units of premium IPO shares to the foreign employment citizens of Nepal on Shrawan 21, 2080

Mandu Hydropower Limited has extended its 2,72,730.00 units of premium IPO shares to the project affected local residents of Lalitpur District, Bagmati VDC Ward No. 01 & 02, Makwanpur District Bhimphedi VDC Ward No. 05, 06, 07, & 08/Indra Sarowar 03 till Shrawan 26, 2080
Mandu Hydropower Limited is going to close its 1,36,364.00 units of premium IPO shares to the foreign employment citizens of Nepal from today, Shrawan 11, 2080

Mandu Hydropower Limited is going to open its 2,72,730.00 units of premium IPO shares to the projected affected local residents of Lalitpur District, Bagmati VDC Ward No. 01 & 02, Makwanpur District Bhimfedi VDC Ward No. 05, 06, 07, & 08/Indra Sarowar 03 and 1,36,364.00 units of premium IPO shares to the foreign employment citizens of Nepal starting from today, Ashad 28, 2080
